name: webpoint-boilerplate
description: A simple Pug/SCSS boilerplate for WebPoint.

scripts.test: npx pug-lint src & npx eslint src & npx parcel build src/index.pug -d .temp --log-level 2 --cache-dir .temp/.cache & npx del-cli .temp
scripts.deploy: npx del-cli dist & git clone -b deploy --single-branch https://github.com/webpointco/CLSC.git dist & npx del-cli "dist/*" "!dist/.git" & npm run build & cd dist & git add -A & git commit -m "%npm_config_message%" & git push & cd ../

author: Adam Goldstein
